Package ElectronicAssetTradingPlatform.AssetTrading

Class Offer

java.lang.Object
ElectronicAssetTradingPlatform.AssetTrading.Offer
Direct Known Subclasses:
BuyOffer, SellOffer
public abstract class Offer
extends java.lang.Object
An abstract class that is used to help create trade offers to buy/sell assets

  • Constructor Details

    • Offer

      public Offer​(java.lang.String assetName, int quantity, double pricePerUnit, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String organisationalUnitName)
      Constructor for trade offer
      Parameters:
      assetName - Name of the asset to be bought or sold
      quantity - Quantity of asset
      pricePerUnit - Price of the asset
      username - The username of the user who made the offer
      organisationalUnitName - The name of the organisation whose assets and credits will be affected

  • Method Details

    • getOfferID

      public abstract int getOfferID()
      Getter for Offer ID
      Returns:
      The particular offerID of an offer as an integer.

    • createUniqueID

      protected abstract int createUniqueID()
      Create a unique ID for sell and buy offers. The IDs are separate between buy and sell offers e.g. there can be a sell and buy offer with IDs == 1 at the same time
      Returns:
      A unique ID for either sell or buy offers as an integer.

    • toString

      public abstract java.lang.String toString()
      Override the object and covert it into a string.
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      The object in string format.

    • getPriceMatchedOffer

      public abstract int getPriceMatchedOffer()
      Compare the newly created offer with existing buy and sell orders and resolve matching ones e.g. if the order is a sell order check existing buy orders, if the order is a buy order check existing sell orders).
      Returns:
      Returns the matching order ID if there is a match, returns 0 otherwise.

    • resolveOffer

      public abstract void resolveOffer()
      If there is a matched offer deduct or add appropriate amount of credits from the organisational unit's involved Also add/remove the correct amount of assets bought or sold to the organisational units Also update the offer's quantities or alternatively delete the offer when it has been fully resolved [M]
